cast.name: 杰里米·克拉克森 Jeremy Clarkson

introduction: Following a short foreword by his fellow presenters Quentin Willson, Jeremy Clarkson and Vicki Butler-Henderson, Tiff Needell presents a compilation of his most extreme driving moments using footage recorded from Series 39 through Series 42 of Old Top Gear. This includes moments such as Needell ice racing a specialised Nissan Micra at Isola from Series 39, Episode 2, an attempt to break a British speed record in the McLaren F1 at the beginning of Series 41, and test-driving the then-new BMW M5 in Episode 12 of Series 41.
